observation: I can see the sign-up page for Deriv with a residence selection form. There's a 'Select your residence' section with a dropdown that currently shows 'Select' and a 'Next' button below it. I also see language selection modals that appear to be open, and there's a 'Log in' link at the bottom for existing users. The page title indicates this is for starting with a free demo account.
reasoning: I need to select my country/region from the dropdown before I can proceed with the sign-up process. The dropdown currently shows 'Select' as placeholder text, so I need to click on it to open the country selection options.
ux_issues: Multiple language selection modals appear to be overlapping or stuck open, creating visual clutter
The interface has unnecessary complexity with multiple language selection areas visible

outcome.visual_observation: The Country/region dropdown opened successfully, showing a search field with 'United States' pre-filled and a 'No result found' message below. The dropdown expanded to show the search interface as expected.
